statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EE.Name, FF.Name, AA.Name) as RowNo , BB.ID , BB.CreatedOn , BB.CreatedBy , BB.CreatedByName , BB.UpdatedOn , BB.UpdatedBy , BB.UpdatedByName
, AA.SiteID as SiteID , AA.BrandCode as BrandCode , AA.CategoryID as CategoryID , AA.ID as ScrapProductID , BB.SmapsProductID as SmapsProductID
, EE.Name as BrandName , FF.Name as CategoryName , AA.Name as ScrapProductName , CC.product_name as SmapsProductName
FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapProduct AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TScrapProductToSmaps BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.ScrapProductID LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsProduct CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.SmapsProductID = CC.ID LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TScrapBrand EE WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.SiteID = EE.SiteID AND AA.BrandCode = EE.Code LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TScrapCategory FF WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.SiteID = FF.SiteID AND AA.CategoryID = FF.ID WHERE AA.SiteID = #SiteID#
AND AA.BrandCode = #BrandCode#
AND AA.CategoryID = #CategoryID#
AND BB.SmapsProductID IS NOT NULL
AND BB.SmapsProductID IS NULL
AND ( AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' OR CC.product_name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapProductToSmaps AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapProductToSmaps AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ScrapProductID = #ScrapProductID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TScrapProductToSmaps ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ScrapProductID, SmapsProductID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ScrapProductID#, #SmapsProductID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE IKScrap.dbo.TScrapProductToSmaps SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ScrapProductID = #ScrapProductID# , SmapsProductID = #SmapsProductID# WHERE ID = #ID#
